definition: (personal) warmth/approachability/accessibility/(in a product) user friendliness/(chemistry) affinity
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: Good appearance and manner, flexible and have strong affability .
sentences.chinese: 形象气质较好，头脑灵活，具有较强亲和力。

sentences.english: Look for charities that you believe in and to which you have some affinity.
sentences.chinese: 寻找慈善事业，相信你和你具有一定的亲和力。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for the measurement of relative affinity of phage antibodies.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立一种测定噬菌体抗体相对亲和力的方法。

sentences.english: The different isozymes bind calcium ions with different affinities.
sentences.chinese: 不同的同功酶以不同的亲和力与钙离子相结合。

sentences.english: My character geniality, have the appetency.
sentences.chinese: 我的个性温和，较具亲和力。

sentences.english: Does likability mean less to the end of the competition?
sentences.chinese: 亲和力在比赛中的影响会越来越小吗？

sentences.english: Sincere service of "silk-like" familiarizes the "Amorous feelings from Europe Continent".
sentences.chinese: “丝一般”的真情服务，使“欧陆风情”别具亲和力。

sentences.english: Methods The titer and affinity of anti-A secreted by hybridoma were tested by tube method and slide method.
sentences.chinese: 通过试管法和玻片法检测抗A抗体的效价和亲和力。

sentences.english: Everyone has a potential affinity with a charitable organization.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都对慈善组织抱有潜在的亲和力。

sentences.english: Lemon fizzles out is the markeddest color, have affinity more at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 柠檬黄是最醒目的颜色，同时更具有亲和力。

sentences.english: Streptavidin has a remarkably high affinity for its natural ligand, biotin.
sentences.chinese: 链霉亲和素与它的配体具有显著的高亲和力。

sentences.english: This substance has an affinity for water.
The Michaelis-Menten equation showed that there was a strong co-relationship between PPO and catechol.
sentences.chinese: 米氏方程显示PPO与邻苯二酚有极强的亲和力。

sentences.english: The extent of beneficial effect of each element considerably depended on its affinity for oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 脱氧是加进同氧的亲和力比铁更大的元素来实现的。

sentences.english: The reduced binding of the toxin to the midgut acceptors.
sentences.chinese: 中肠的吸附位点对毒素蛋白的亲和力下降。

sentences.english: This paper emphasizes that innovation in the service industry comes from using knowledge as well as conviviality.
sentences.chinese: 亲和力和知识力都是服务业创新的来源。

definition: amiable and approachable (idiom); easy-going/modest and unassuming/(of writing) plain and simple/easy to understand
